text: geudaedeul-ege bumonimgwa gakkaun chincheog-e daehan yueon-i uimu sahang-eulo gyujeongdoeeossnola : geudaedeul jung-e nugunga-ege jug-eum-i chaj-awass-eul ttae, geuligo geuga jaesan-eul namgyeoss-eul gyeong-ueneun habdanghan naeyong-eulo yueonhaeya hani ineun hananim-eul gyeong-oehaneun ja-ege bugwadoen uimula
